data.title: David Parks OBE on LinkedIn: The Skill Mill Life Chances Fund Social Impact Bond (SIB)
data.meta_description: The delivery phase is now complete through an OUTCOMES PARTNERSHIP with the emphasis on #OUTCOMES and #PARTNERSHIP and the #LifeChancesFund. Sincere thank yous…
data.text: The delivery phase is now complete through an OUTCOMES PARTNERSHIP with the emphasis on #OUTCOMES and #PARTNERSHIP and the #LifeChancesFund. Sincere thank yous to everyone who has pulled together to delivered this incredible programme. Thank you especially to our Social Investors at Big Issue Invest Lars Hagelmann and Sergio Sánchez Toledo; Northstar Ventures UK Ian Richards and Naomi Allen Seales; Resonance Limited Anne Woolhouse, Grace England; Charities Aid Foundation (CAF) Big Society Capital and The Access Foundation to Simon Newberry and Matt Baird and the team at Social Finance, The National Lottery Community Fund and Chih Hoong Sin; James Magowan, Marguerite Weatherseed and the team at Department for Culture, Media and Sport and the Youth Justice Board for England and Wales (YJB) all our Local Commissioners Durham County Council, Leeds City Council, Birmingham Children's Trust (England) Rochdale Borough Council Nottingham City Council Croydon Council Surrey County Council and West Sussex County Council and all our corporate partners Kier Group, CEG:, The Land Trust, Mears Group PLC, Sir Robert McAlpine Our academic partners Chris Fox and Russell Webster and Mara Airoldi Andreea Anastasiu and Juliana Outes Velarde at Government Outcomes Lab, University of Oxford and the many many others who have supported along the way. Will leave it to Jamie to tell his story like so many of the other individual young people who have been on this transformative journey.... Will you join us for the next chapter......?
